title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Uinta Mountains, Utah
content:
Photo submitted by Martin Cole, “Out for a gravel ride in Soapstone Basin, Uinta Mountains, Utah.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Uinta Mountains, Utah appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
